description: This file defines a React-like component 'NotesHome' for the frontend of a notes application, creating the main page layout including header, notes list, and note editor, with state management and event handlers.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: Main component representing the home page of the notes application with layout, state, and event methods.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of a note, updating the current selected note ID.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and sets it as the current selected note.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Handles hover event on the 'New' button, changing its background color.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Reverts the 'New' button background color after hover.
